# isFunction() function
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/types](./esdmr.assert.types.md) &gt; [isFunction](./esdmr.assert.types.isfunction.md)


Asserts that the given value is a function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isFunction(value: unknown, detail?: string, ...args: unknown[]): asserts value is FunctionLike;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | Value to assert. |
|  detail | string | Extra description. |
|  args | unknown\[\] | Format arguments. |

<b>Returns:</b>

asserts value is [FunctionLike](./esdmr.assert.types.functionlike.md)
